tuv.seg: Life Event Document Moving abroad from Ireland Discusses the stress involved in moving country and suggests that good preparations beforehand can ease the transition
Life Event Document Ag bogadh thar lear ó Éirinn Tá cur síos anseo ar na bealaí is fearr chunan strus a bhaineann le aistriú thar lear a laghdú
Documentation and other requirements when leaving Ireland
Cáipéisí úsáideacha le tabhairt leat agus tú ag taisteal thar lear
In addition to your passport, find out about the other documents to bring on your travels abroad
De bhreis ar do phas, faigh amach na cáipéisí eile úsáideacha ag teastáil uait agus tú ag taisteal thar lear
Police Certificates are often required when applying for a visa to visit or travel to other countries
Go minic bíonn Teastais Phóilíní riachtanach sula gcuireann tú isteach ar víosa chun cuairt a thabhairt ar thíortha eile nó chun taisteal chucu
Leaving Ireland and your social security entitlements
Do chearta leasa shóisialta agus tú ag fágáil Éireann
Ireland has social security arrangements with other countries
Tá socruithe leasa shóisialta ag Éirinn le tíortha eile
What do you need to know about social security (PRSI) if you are leaving Ireland to return home or work abroad?
Cén t-eolas a bhíonn ag teastáil uait faoi leas sóisialach (ÁSPC), má bhíonn tú ag fágail Éireann chun dul abhaile nó chun obair a fháil thar lear?
Diplomatic supports for Irish people abroad
Tacaíocht taidhleoireachta d'Éireannaigh thar lear
The types of support offered by Irish embassies and consulates abroad
Tá cur síos gairid anseo ar an tacaíocht atá ar fáil ó ambasáid agus consalachtaí thar lear
Travelling abroad: general tips
Taisteal thar lear: comhairle ghinearálta
Tips for travellers in order to prevent mis-haps, accidents and inconvenience while abroad
Tá leideanna anseo do thaistealaithe chun timpistí agus eile a sheachaint thar lear
This document is in: Travel and Recreation > Travel abroad
This document is in: Taisteal agus Áineas > Taisteal thar Lear
Health issues when travelling abroad
Saincheisteanna sláinte agus tú ag taisteal thar lear
Your health should be one of your priorities when planning a trip abroad
Ba chóir an tsláinte a bheith ina thosaíocht agat agus tú ag beartú turas a dhéanamh thar lear
